mapper.insert: INSERT INTO push_alarm(user_id, feed_id, comment_id, title, body, target_user_id, is_read) VALUES(#{message.data.userId}, #{message.data.feedId}, #{message.data.commentId}, #{message.notification.title}, #{message.notification.body}, #{message.data.targetUserId}, #{message.data.isRead})
mapper.select: SELECT distinct p.user_id AS uid, u.nickname, u.file_url AS userFileUrl, f.id AS fid, f.file_url AS feedFileUrl, c.id AS cid, c.content AS comment, f.content, p.create_at, p.title, p.body FROM push_alarm p LEFT OUTER JOIN user u ON p.user_id = u.id AND p.target_user_id = #{userId} and p.is_read = 0 LEFT OUTER JOIN feed f ON p.feed_id = f.id LEFT OUTER JOIN comment c ON p.comment_id = c.id ORDER BY create_at DESC LIMIT 20 OFFSET #{page}
